thread.title: Really nice hotel - good service and great sleep
thread.title_full: Really nice hotel - good service and great sleep - Review of Apex City of London Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: roos1ter
title: Really nice hotel - good service and great sleep
text: Really enjoyed my recent stay here while on business. Very comfortable room and very quiet, great room service (steak was delicious!) and the service and overall atmosphere was ideal. Would definitely stay again as great location for transport links as well.
